snippet: The world champions Meryl Davis and Charlie White broke their own record with 80.69 points on Friday in the short dance at the United States figure skating championships in Boston.
abstract: World champion ice dancers Meryl Davis and Charlie White break their own record in the short dance at the United States figure skating championships, scoring 80.69 points; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The world champions Meryl Davis and Charlie White broke their own record with 80.69 points on Friday in the short dance at the United States figure skating championships in Boston.

headline.main: Meryl Davis and Charlie White Lead U.S. Nationals
